record.id: field.name="require.password" and file.name="pmenv" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: require.password
record.file.name: pmenv

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), requires members of this profile to use a login password each time when accessing the Incident Management environment.
An unknown condition (blank field) evaluates to false.

When this option is true, operators are not required to re-enter their password unless they exit the Incident Management environment. Therefore, you must also enable the Confirm on End option to prevent accidental session termination.

detail.detail: Clients using the COVER or AXCES modules should enable this option since normal login security is bypassed by cut-throughs.
Refer to COVER and/or AXCES documentation for further information.
